trans-unit.target: TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_SEQ_00<tab>Fray was here long before you met.

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_SEQ_01<tab>Fray knows what is best for us, so we will do as <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> asks. We will wait for <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> outside the Gates of Judgement and say <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> name so <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> will know we are here.

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_SEQ_02<tab>A pair of knights hailing from Whitebrim Front overhear your summons and recognize you as the Warrior of Light. Seizing the opportunity to exploit the good nature of the fool who could not wait for <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> comrade and put this nonsense behind <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> forever, the knights convince you to help them deal with a band of giants. Head to Daniffen Pass and get it over with.

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_SEQ_03<tab>While your courageous new friends distract the dross, you will seek out and slay the leader. What a brilliant plan! Nothing like the countless other times we slew someone else's enemies.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_SEQ_04<tab>You killed them. Well done. Can we go now?

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_SEQ_05<tab>Serve... Save... Slave... Slay... You struggle to hear the words of the knights over the pounding in your head. It would seem that Lord Drillemont has summoned you to Whitebrim Front to discuss allegations which have been made against you, including the rather disturbing charge that you were observed conversing with a corpse. Nothing for it, then. Journey to Whitebrim Front and kill them all.

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_SEQ_06<tab>Darkness dwells within us all, but few are forced to confront it as you are. One moment, Fray stands before you, and in the next, it is your twin. As you wrestle for control with your darkside, the voices of Whitebrim Front cry out to you in support, even as your own voice belittles your struggle. And then...as quickly as it began, it ends. Your soul is in your keeping once more.

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_SEQ_07<tab>By Lord Drillemont's command, none will speak of what they saw─a gesture you find more comforting with every passing moment. Even after regaining your faculties, your memories of Fray are still muddled...and though your darkside has been subdued, it remains your constant companion, yearning to be free. Yearning to set you free. You need only ask.
※The next dark knight quest is available from the unflinching Temple Knight in Whitebrim Front.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_TODO_00<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “Fray!” to call out to your comrade.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the unbending knight at Daniffen Pass.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_TODO_02<tab>Slay the giants.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the unbending knight.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the untiring knight.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_TODO_05<tab>Speak with the untiring knight.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_000<tab>I knew you would come to your senses, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Now, let us...let us go...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_001<tab>...If I never see snow again, it'll be too soon.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_002<tab>We should go somewhere warm─at least for a little while...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_003<tab>Wait for me near the Gates of Judgement. When you are alone, call out and I shall join you.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>A moment later, Fray departs...though in what direction you cannot seem to recall...

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase which includes “Fray” to attract <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> attention.

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase which includes “Fray” to attract <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> attention.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_SAY_000_000<tab>Fray
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_010<tab>(-???-)Wait, I <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> that voice! It's <var 29 EB02 /var>, the hero of the Scions!

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_011<tab>Allow me to say what an honor it is to meet you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! I mean, by the Fury, the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who bested Shiva! Every knight under Lord Drillemont's command knows the tale!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_012<tab>I could go on, but, well...I'll just say it. If I may, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>─we need your help.

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYB02058_000_013<tab>We've a giant problem, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. A band of them has taken to raiding caravans passing through Daniffen Pass. We think they may be planning to expand their territory...

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYB02058_000_014<tab>Lord Drillemont wants them gone, but you know how it is─too much work for too few hands. We'd need at least two dozen knights to clear them out safely...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYB02058_000_015<tab>But now that you're here, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, we have nothing to fear!

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_016<tab>Aye! While we create a distraction, you can slip past and put their leader down! Without him, they're sure to cut and run! So will you help us, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYS02058_000_017<tab>(-House Durendaire Knights-)We beg of you!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYS02058_000_018<tab>(-House Durendaire Knights-)We <var 1A 02 /var>beg<var 1A 01 /var> of you!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYB02058_000_019<tab>Thank you so much, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. We won't forget this!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_020<tab>Pray accompany me to the pass, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. We can discuss the finer details of our plan there.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_021<tab>No... No more. Enough...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_030<tab>The leader should be somewhere in the tunnels, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>...

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_031<tab>Once you are in position, we'll launch our attack. If all goes to plan, you should only have to contend with the leader and his guards. May the Fury guide and protect us!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_040<tab>We'll do our best to keep them distracted, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_050<tab>By the Fury, you really did it! And you made it look so easy!

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_051<tab>As for us─there were some injuries, but nothing serious. It was starting to look rather grim, actually...but the moment he fell, they sounded the retreat.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_052<tab>It was an honor to fight with you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! You really are everything the bards say.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_053<tab>Truth be told...I've been following your deeds for some time now...ever since you first came to Whitebrim Front.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_054<tab>Your martial prowess is widely known, of course, but what I found truly inspirational was your compassion for the common man.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_055<tab>How you would risk your life without thought for fame or fortune, how the lowest among us could find a friend in you...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYC02058_000_056<tab>(-???-)Sir, sir!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_057<tab>Is something wrong?

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYC02058_000_058<tab>It's Lord Drillemont, sir. He heard we were in the field with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and is demanding <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> come to Whitebrim Front at once!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_059<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Demanding<var 1A 01 /var>!? What is the meaning of this!?

TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYC02058_000_060<tab>Certain...allegations have been made, sir. It would seem that <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> was observed conversing with...with a corpse in the Brume...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYC02058_000_061<tab>Not that anyone would ever believe such slander, of course...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYA02058_000_070<tab>Surely there is no need for concern. I mean, “conversing with a corpse”? What fools do they take us for?
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYC02058_000_080<tab>I should warn you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, that some of these allegations were made by Temple Knights.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYC02058_000_081<tab>You, um...you may be asked to surrender your weapon...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_100<tab>Hah hah...“surrender your weapon”? After what happened in Ul'dah? They must be mad.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_101<tab>Pay attention, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. This could be the greatest moment of our life...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_102<tab>That is, if you could stop denying the truth that's been staring you in the face since the moment we met.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_103<tab>Say my name. Say it. My <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> name. <var 1A 02 /var>Our<var 1A 01 /var> real name!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_104<tab>Come now, you <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> Fray was dead from the beginning, but you didn't care!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_105<tab>You had a sword and a soul crystal. But what you <var 1A 02 /var>wanted<var 1A 01 /var> was a mentor.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_106<tab>A mentor with the <var 1A 02 /var>gifts<var 1A 01 /var> and the knowledge. A dark knight who could guide you on the path─who you could aspire to become.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_107<tab>A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who was free to say and do the things you would not.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_108<tab>...Even now, you continue to deny it. Well. Deny me all you want. You cannot deny what we have done.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_109<tab>Have I not been good to you? Have I not given you everything I promised?
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_110<tab>Did I not help you to hear the whispers of our very soul!?
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_111<tab>Open your eyes. Look. Do you see now? Do you <var 1A 02 /var>see<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_112<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)Everything up to now has been your story...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_113<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)...And everything after now will be <var 1A 02 /var>mine<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_130<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)It would seem I underestimated myself... But no matter.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_131<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)They have borne witness to the darkness within us...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_132<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)To what lies beneath the mask...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRY02058_000_133<tab>(-???-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Listen to us!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CENOTA_000_134<tab>(-Cenota-)We will never forsake you! No matter what!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CLOTAIRION_000_135<tab>(-Clotairion-)We know who you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We know─and so do you!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_136<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)A fantastic display of willful ignorance...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_137<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)Wipe the slate clean. Forgive and forget!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_138<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)Convince yourselves that <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> can be controlled...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_139<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)The Warrior of Light! Our Weapon of Light!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_140<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)It isn't too late, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We...we can still be free...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_141<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_142<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)So this is your answer...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_143<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)Listen to my voice. Listen to our heartbeat. Listen...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_144<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)...If this is how it must be, then so be it.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_145<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)But know that when you tire of this charade, I shall be here...waiting to take the reins...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_FRAY_000_146<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)You need only ask...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_TEMPLEKNIGHT02059_000_150<tab>I...I do not know what I just witnessed. Nor am I sure I wish to know...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYC02058_000_160<tab>Praise Halone you're all right, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! For a moment, we feared we'd lost you forever...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYC02058_000_161<tab>Lord Drillemont made it clear that we will speak no more of what happened. Not that he had to ask, mind...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYC02058_000_162<tab>As for your...friend... I am told he will be interred with full rites. May his soul rest in peace...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_CAVALRYC02058_000_000<tab>...Are you certain you are all right, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? You seem a little... Never mind. Fare you well...
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Embrace the abyss! Set yourself free!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_QIB_001_DRILLEMONT_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Fight, damn you! Fight!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_QIB_001_FRAY_BATTLETALK_PLAYERHP50<tab>Oh, look! You're doing it again! Bravo, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, bravo!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_QIB_001_FRAY_BATTLETALK_00<tab>You can't really kill me, you know. Oh, you'll try. But you'll fail.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_QIB_001_FRAY_BATTLETALK_10<tab>You may as well put the blade at your own neck. But where would that leave us, hmmm?
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_QIB_001_DRILLEMONT_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Pull yourself together, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You are stronger than this!
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_QIB_001_FRAY_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Friends? Really? This is a <var 1A 02 /var>private<var 1A 01 /var> affair, and you know it.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_QIB_001_FRAY_BATTLETALK_20<tab>But carry on pretending otherwise, if it please.
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_QIB_001_FRAY_BATTLETALK_03<tab>Heh...things are certainly coming to a head, aren't they!?
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_QIB_001_FRAY_BATTLETALK_30<tab>Do you have any idea how ridiculous you look? Flailing about like a wild beast in a battle against <var 1A 02 /var>yourself<var 1A 01 /var>!?
TEXT_JOBDRK500_02058_QIB_001_FRAY_BATTLETALK_31<tab>A house divided cannot stand, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
